vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.20;
son of: Ishi (H3469H);
brother of: Ben-zoheth (H1132)
§ Zoheth = "releasing"
a son of Ishi of the tribe of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Isí; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
梭黑 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "散放"
猶大支派的後裔 (代上 4:20)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
梭黑 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "散放"
犹大支派的后裔 (代上 4:20)
